meanings.definition: Having or showing a friendly, generous, and considerate nature.
meanings.sent1: She displayed her kindheartedness by helping the new student feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: The kindheartedness of the nurse made the patients feel cared for.
meanings.sent3: His kindheartedness was so evident that even the grumpy cat warmed up to him.
meanings.sent4: The kindheartedness of the teacher was a beacon of light in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The kindheartedness of the old man touched the hearts of everyone he met.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being kindhearted.
meanings.sent1: The kindheartedness in her actions made everyone admire her.
meanings.sent2: His kindheartedness towards animals showed his compassion.
meanings.sent3: The kindheartedness of the clown made even the grumpiest audience member smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindheartedness was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The kindheartedness of the community shone brightly during the charity event.
